import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    victim = set(i for i in range(1, n+1))
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        victim -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(len(victim))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
#!/usr/bin/env python3
import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    survivors = set([i for i in range(1, n+1)])
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        survivors -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(len(survivors))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    victims = set([i for i in range(1, n + 1)])
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        victims -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()[1:]))
    print(len(victims))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, K = map(int, input().split())

A = []
for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    A.append(list(map(int, input().split())))

A_flat = []
for i in range(K):
    A_flat.extend(A[i])
A_flat = set(A_flat)

ans = N - len(A_flat)
print(ans)

import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    victim = set(range(1, n+1))
    for _ in range(k):

        victim -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    victims = set(i for i in range(1, n+1))
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        victims -= set(int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().split())
    print(len(victims))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N = int(input())
A = [int(i) for i in input().split()]

for i in range(N):
    print(A[i], end="")
    if i != N - 1:
        print(" ", end="")

import sys

def main():
    n, k = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    survivors = set([i for i in range(1, n+1)])
    for _ in range(k):
        d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
        survivors -= set(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(len(survivors))
